EmailTemplate.name: 1.2.3 Right to work process
EmailTemplate.subject: Re: your application to NCS with The Challenge
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please do not respond to this email. This email was sent from an unattended mailbox, and replies are not reviewed. Please instead contact your Staffing representative on {!Contact.Contact_Owner_alternative_email__c}
Dear {!Contact.FirstName}
Thank you for your interest in NCS with The Challenge.
We understand that you do not have the right to work in the UK. In order to do so, you may need to apply for permission under the points-based system. To find out about the different tiers, and what you will need for your application, please go to the DirectGov website and search for "Permission to work in the UK".
Best wishes,
Staffing Department The Challenge e: staffing.support@the-challenge.org
CR 1.2.3
